attributes.action: Govern the volume that TV adverts are broadcast .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many TV Adverts are now being broadcast at a volume that is much higher than the programming it is broadcast with .. 

this is a pest to TV Viewers .

This petition asks simply for this to be governed accordingly .. 

Make the adverts the same volume as the programmes !!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
